xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:java="java" version="1.0"><xsl:output indent="no" /><xsl:template match="/"><xsl:variable name="dateFormat" select="java:text.SimpleDateFormat.new()"/> <xsl:variable name="pattern" select='"dd"'/><xsl:variable name="empty" select="java:applyPattern($dateFormat,$pattern)"/><xsl:variable name="dateAsLong" select="java:lang.Long.parseLong(number(.))"/><xsl:variable name="passedDate" select="java:util.Date.new($dateAsLong)"/><value><xsl:value-of select="java:format($dateFormat,$passedDate)"/></value></xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:java="java" version="1.0"><xsl:output indent="no" /><xsl:template match="/"><xsl:variable name="dateFormat" select="java:text.SimpleDateFormat.new()"/> <xsl:variable name="pattern" select='"MM"'/><xsl:variable name="empty" select="java:applyPattern($dateFormat,$pattern)"/><xsl:variable name="dateAsLong" select="java:lang.Long.parseLong(number(.))"/><xsl:variable name="passedDate" select="java:util.Date.new($dateAsLong)"/><value><xsl:value-of select="java:format($dateFormat,$passedDate)"/></value></xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:java="java" version="1.0"><xsl:output indent="no" /><xsl:template match="/"><xsl:variable name="dateFormat" select="java:text.SimpleDateFormat.new()"/> <xsl:variable name="pattern" select='"yyyy"'/><xsl:variable name="empty" select="java:applyPattern($dateFormat,$pattern)"/><xsl:variable name="dateAsLong" select="java:lang.Long.parseLong(number(.))"/><xsl:variable name="passedDate" select="java:util.Date.new($dateAsLong)"/><value><xsl:value-of select="java:format($dateFormat,$passedDate)"/></value></xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:java="java" version="1.0"><xsl:output indent="no" /><xsl:template match="/"><xsl:variable name="dateFormat" select="java:text.SimpleDateFormat.new()"/> <xsl:variable name="pattern" select='"HH"'/><xsl:variable name="empty" select="java:applyPattern($dateFormat,$pattern)"/><xsl:variable name="dateAsLong" select="java:lang.Long.parseLong(number(.))"/><xsl:variable name="passedDate" select="java:util.Date.new($dateAsLong)"/><value><xsl:value-of select="java:format($dateFormat,$passedDate)"/></value></xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:java="java" version="1.0"><xsl:output indent="no" /><xsl:template match="/"><xsl:variable name="dateFormat" select="java:text.SimpleDateFormat.new()"/> <xsl:variable name="pattern" select='"mm"'/><xsl:variable name="empty" select="java:applyPattern($dateFormat,$pattern)"/><xsl:variable name="dateAsLong" select="java:lang.Long.parseLong(number(.))"/><xsl:variable name="passedDate" select="java:util.Date.new($dateAsLong)"/><value><xsl:value-of select="java:format($dateFormat,$passedDate)"/></value></xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:java="java" version="1.0"><xsl:output indent="no" /><xsl:template match="/"><xsl:variable name="dateFormat" select="java:text.SimpleDateFormat.new()"/> <xsl:variable name="pattern" select='"dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm"'/><xsl:variable name="empty" select="java:applyPattern($dateFormat,$pattern)"/><xsl:variable name="dateAsLong" select="java:lang.Long.parseLong(number(.))"/><xsl:variable name="passedDate" select="java:util.Date.new($dateAsLong)"/><value><xsl:value-of select="java:format($dateFormat,$passedDate)"/></value></xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
